```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
library(here)

sites <- c("ca_pilot", "co_pilot", "de_pilot")

task_data_nested <- sites |>
  set_names() |>
  map(\(s) read_rds(here(glue("01_processed_data/{s}/task_data_nested.rds")))) |>
  list_rbind(names_to = "site")

task_data_combined <- task_data_nested |>
  select(-task_id) |>
  unnest(data)
```
